content: only be careful not to touch the braids you did with the slip stitches round 3 chain 3 make 3 double_crochet increase in the first stitch double_crochet in next 3 sts skip next st double_crochet in next st work a total of 4 times double_crochet in next 2 sts make 3 double_crochet in next st make 3 double_crochet in next st double_crochet in next 3 sts skip next st double_crochet in next st work a total of 4 times double_crochet in next 2 sts make 3 double_crochet in next st repeat till the end of the round round 4 slip_stitch in every st work rounds 3 and 4 a total of 13 times or until your desired length double_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet crochet in the back loop slip_stitch strap chain 3 chain 1 chain 1 doesn t count as stitch row 1 half_double_crochet into all 3 sts chain 1 work row 1 until your desired strap length sew the strap to the bag weave in your ends and you are done for any questions message me via etsy or email if you would like to share your work on instagram make sure to tag me @artsymaki and use #gelatowaterbottlebag so i can share your photo www etsy com/shop/artsymaki artsymaki@gmail com @artsymaki
